Intermediate R Workshop Notes Hena R. Ramay 2020-04-30 Chapter 1 Introduction This notebook is created so that the particpants of the workshop can follow along with the instructors. We will contantly update this notebook during the workshop to include answers to the questions asked during the workshop. 1.1 Workshop Schedule We will try to cover the following material in the course: Day1 9:00 - 9:30 am Introductions and workshop overview 9:30 -10:30 Conditionals and Loops 10:45 - 12 pm Functions 1 pm -2 pm Apply family 2 - 4 pm Advanced plotting ggplot2 Day2 9:00 -10:30 R markdown basics 10:45 -12 Knitr chunks 1-2 pm Rmarkdown themes, adding html and custom css styling 2- 4 pm A short project to bring it all together! 1.2 Important links
